mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_ma_news ( title, content, small_img_uri, big_img_uri, author, create_time, type, STATUS ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{smallImgUri}, #{bigImgUri}, #{author}, NOW(), #{type}, #{status} );
mapper.update: update t_ma_news set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, small_img_uri = #{smallImgUri}, big_img_uri = #{bigImgUri}, author = #{author}, type = #{type}, status = #{status} where id =#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_ma_news WHERE type = #{type} AND STATUS != 3 LIMIT #{count}
SELECT * FROM t_ma_news WHERE type = #{type} AND STATUS != 3 LIMIT #{start},#{pageSize}
